                                             //BIG OH
                                                                                        
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<list>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<iomanip>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<complex>
#include<utility>
#include<functional>
#include<bitset>
#include<numeric>
#include<cassert>
#include<climits>
#include <fstream> 
using namespace std;
#define ll  long long 
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define mod 1000000007
#define pq priority_queue
#define vi vector<int>
#define eps 1e-9
#define inf (1 << 28)
#define  MX 1002
#define pi pair<int ,int >


int main()
{
   int n;
   cin>>n;
   int profit=0;
   int dp[100005];
   memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
   while(n--)
   {
      string str;
      int num;
      cin>>str>>num;        
      if(str=="found")
      {
        dp[num]=profit;
      }     
      else
      {
         if(dp[num]>=0)
         {
           profit=max(profit,dp[num]+num);
           dp[num]=-1;
         }
      }
   }
   cout<<profit<<endl;        
}
